Package com.fdmgroup.elevatorproject

Class ElevatorController

java.lang.Object
com.fdmgroup.elevatorproject.ElevatorController
public class ElevatorController extends Object
Class ElevatorController A class that verifies command(s) from passenger(s) and assign a valid command to each elevator.
Version:
3/8/22 initial version
Author:
TeamGreat

      public void commandAdd(String instruction)
      Method commandAdd Adds instruction for elevators to the command list initialised in the constructor
      Parameters:

    • validateInput

      public boolean validateInput(String instruction)
      Method validateInput Checks if an instruction (a list of commands) for elevator(s) is valid
      Parameters:
      instruction - - a list of commands for elevator(s)
      Returns:
      boolean - true if an instruction if valid, false otherwise

    • run

      public void run()
      Method run Reads a configuration file, activates elevator(s), assigns a command to an elevator and calls ElevatorView class to display a state of an elevator

      Method join Joins elevator thread
